summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.7°C) and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 5457 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 11001 lux), cloud levels (up 1815 m), outside temperature (up 1.5°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and winds will be practically absent. Rain showers likely, occasional overcast conditions, and periods of sunshine are expected. Weather could become unsettled.
